The Bundesliga side have been actively pursuing Hudson-Odoi for the past year and with minutes at Chelsea seemingly hard to come by, Bayern may finally get the player they’ve been monitoring.

However, Chelsea have denied any agreement and Hudson-Odoi is expected to be in Frank Lampard’s starting XI vs Crystal Palace on Saturday.

Bayern Munich are attempting to convince Chelsea to part ways with Callum Hudson-Odoi through an initial loan, although the German champions are willing to include an obligation to buy him in 2021.

Goal can confirm that talks are a long way from being agreed in principle and Chelsea could block the approach at any time for their 19-year-old winger, who has four years left on his contract.

【Now Sports】文迪來投之後，艾利沙巴拿加失去了車路士首席門將的地位，目前藍軍願意將其外借，但《太陽報》卻報稱沒有球隊願意接手。
艾利沙巴拿加（Kepa Arrizabalaga）與卡巴利路在比賽中同樣失誤連連，新加盟的文迪勢成正選門將，但車路士絕不希望Kepa領著15萬鎊高薪去坐冷板凳，惟球會CEO Marina Granovskaia卻無意將其出售，因此只剩下外借一途。 然而《太陽報》報道指出，受到新冠病毒疫情影響下，沒有球隊願意負起Kepa 15萬鎊的薪資，即使車路士一方同意支付一半以上的薪酬，也是乏人問津。 鑑於車路士今夏瘋狂收購，他們急需賣出或借出部分球員來舒緩財政壓力，除了艾利沙巴拿加之外，魯迪加與馬高斯阿朗素亦同樣在放售名單之內。巴克利周三已經落實外借至阿士東維拉，而洛夫斯捷克就被韋斯咸虎視眈眈。

- Matt Law
